steps.title: We have one more question about the study experience. In a minute, we'll ask you for your ideas to make this study better. But first...
Pick the response that describes how you felt today
So, did you come up with any ideas for improving the experience you just went through? Please tell us about them.
steps.placeholderText: To protect your privacy, please do not include your name or any information that could be used to identify you. NOTICE: We are not monitoring your response in real time. If you need help, contact a doctor or mental health care provider. Resources are available on the study website.

steps.title: Thanks! Tomorrow's the big finale. Please come back tomorrow for one final survey.
